data.neighbors.hubness.util

Class DefaultGBHubnessArraysGetter

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.neighbors.hubness.util.DefaultGBHubnessArraysGetter

  • public class DefaultGBHubnessArraysGetter
extends java.lang.Object
    This utility script quickly extracts the good and bad neighbor occurrence frequency arrays for a directory of datasets in the default metric and for the specified neighborhood size. As for optional parameters, there is TFIDF and the option of calculating the secondary shared neighbor distances, namely simcos or simhub. The script doesn't run through the file system recursively, it processes only the datasets on the first level.
